content: {"name": "The Salvation Army of Harlem Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For Food Pantry Appointment Please Call 212-862-3900, 9:00 a.m.~3:00p.m.\nServes 125th Ave up to Washington Heights only.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/HarlemTemple/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "540 Lenox Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10037", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.815423, "longitude": -73.9393346}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 862-3900", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
